welcomeMessage:
Welcome to The Git Commit Helper! ğŸ‰
This tool helps you create high-quality commits following Conventional Commits best practices and Gemini AI.
By Maurizio T.
ensureConfig: Make sure you have a gch.config.json file in the project root.
ensureApiKey: Make sure you have the Gemini AI API key in the gch.config.json file.
generatingMessage: âŒ›â€‹ Please wait a few seconds for generation...
invalidFormat: Invalid Conventional Commit format. Example: 'feat: description' or 'feat(scope): description'
cannotDetermineBranch: âŒ Cannot determine the current branch
protectedBranch: ğŸš« You are on the protected branch "{branch}". Committing is not allowed here.
newBranchName: Enter the name of the new branch:
cannotSuggestBranchName: Could not suggest a branch name. No changes detected.
branchCreated: âœ”ï¸ New branch '{branch}' created and checked out.
noFilesModified: âŒ No modified files to add.
ensureFilesModified: Make sure to modify or add files before committing.
selectFiles: Select the files to add to the commit: (all selected by default)
noFilesSelected: âŒ No files selected. Commit cancelled.
askForReview: Do you want a code review before proceeding?
reviewUnavailable: âš ï¸â€‹ Unable to get a review
invalidScore: âš ï¸â€‹ Review does not contain a valid score, {score}
reviewScoreLow: âŒ Review score: {score}/10 - Changes are not sufficient
proceedAnyway: Do you want to proceed anyway? (Warning: the changes may not be adequate)
reviewScoreHigh: âœ… Review score: {score}/10 - Changes approved by Gemini!
commitMessageUnavailable: âš ï¸â€‹ Unable to generate the commit message
askForBody: Do you want to generate a detailed commit body?
bodyUnavailable: âš ï¸ Unable to generate commit body.
editCommitMessage: Do you want to edit the commit message?
newCommitMessage: Enter the new commit message (message only):
proposedCommitPreview: âœ… Preview of the proposed commit message:
modifiedCommitPreview: âœ… Preview of the modified commit message:
branchNoUpstream: âš ï¸ Branch '{branch}' has no upstream remote.
goodbye: ğŸ‰ See you at the next commit! Happy coding! ğŸ‰
diffTooLarge: The selected changes exceed the configured limit of {maxLines} lines ({actualLines} lines). Staging aborted. Please commit smaller changes.
